text: Va ʙar qaʙilai Madjan ʙarodarason Su'ajʙ (alajhissalom)-ro firistodem. Guft: «Ej qavmi man, Allohi jaktoro ʙiparasted, sumoro hec ma'ʙudi ʙarhaqe cuz U nest! Va dar pajmonavu tarozu haqqi mardumro kam makuned! Hamono, sumoro dar ne'mat va osudagi meʙinam. Va ʙa saʙaʙi kam kardanaton dar pajmonavu tarozu az ruze, ki azoʙas sumoro faro girad, metarsam
